languages.text: {n}Эксплораторы примирились с утратой, единственно испросив дозволения провести с Горнилом несколько собственных ритуалов. Когда технолитургии были завершены, техножрецы покинули Фолстоун.{/n}

{n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-Priests departed Foulstone.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Эксплораторы примирились с утратой, единственно испросив дозволения провести с Горнилом несколько собственных ритуалов. Когда технолитургии были завершены, техножрецы покинули Фолстоун.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss, and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-priests have left Foulstone.{/n}

{n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss, and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-priests have left Foulstone.{/n}

{n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-Priests departed Foulstone.{/n}

{n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-Priests departed Foulstone.{/n}

languages.text: {n}开拓者平和地接受了他们的损失，请求允许他们用熔炉举行一部分自己的仪式。技术仪式完成之后，技术神甫就离开了荒寂岩地。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-Priests departed Foulstone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}开拓者平和地接受了他们的损失，请求允许他们用熔炉举行一部分自己的仪式。技术仪式完成之后，技术祭司就离开了荒寂岩地。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los Exploradores han hecho las paces con su pérdida y han pedido permiso para llevar a cabo varios de sus propios rituales con el Crisol. Una vez concluidas las liturgias tecnológicas, los tecnosacerdotes partieron de Rocainmunda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-Priests departed Foulstone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los Exploradores han hecho las paces con su pérdida y han pedido permiso para llevar a cabo varios de sus propios rituales con el Crisol. Una vez concluidas las liturgias tecnológicas, los tecnosacerdotes partieron de Rocainmunda.{/n}

languages.text: {n}エクスプロレイターはその敗北を冷静に受け入れ、坩堝を使った独自の儀式を執り行う許可を求めた。技術典礼が完了すると、技術司祭らはファウルストーンを後にした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-Priests departed Foulstone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}エクスプロレイターはその敗北を冷静に受け入れ、坩堝を使った独自の儀式を執り行う許可を求めた。技術典礼が完了すると、技術司祭らはファウルストーンを後にした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les Explorators acceptent leur défaite et demandent la permission de procéder à plusieurs de leurs propres rituels sur le Creuset. Une fois les technoliturgies accomplies, les technoprêtres quittent Rochepeste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-Priests departed Foulstone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les Explorators acceptent leur défaite et demandent la permission de procéder à plusieurs de leurs propres rituels sur le Creuset. Une fois les technoliturgies accomplies, les technoprêtres quittent Rochepeste.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Exploratoren haben ihren Frieden mit ihrem Verlust gemacht und um die Erlaubnis gebeten, mit dem Tiegel mehrere eigene Rituale ausführen zu dürfen. Als die Tech-Liturgien abgeschlossen waren, reisten die Techpriester von Foulstone ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-Priests departed Foulstone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Exploratoren haben ihren Frieden mit ihrem Verlust gemacht und um die Erlaubnis gebeten, mit dem Tiegel mehrere eigene Rituale ausführen zu dürfen. Als die Tech-Liturgien abgeschlossen waren, reisten die Techpriester von Foulstone ab.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Keşiftörler, kaybettiklerini kabullenerek Pota'yla kendilerine has birtakım ayinler gerçekleştirmek için izin istediler. Tekno Rahipler, tekno ayinlerin tamamlanmasının ardından Menfurtaş'tan ayrıldılar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Explorators have made peace with their loss and asked permission to conduct several of their own rituals with the Crucible. When the tech-liturgies had been completed, the Tech-Priests departed Foulstone.{/n}
